Text: Enron NA Corp Cc As per your negotiations with Corinne Samon please find attached below both a blacklined copy of the negotiated Futures Account Agreement as well as a Clean copy See attached file Enron Corp JPMorganFuturesBlklneddocSee attached file Enron Corp JPMorganFuturesCLEANdoc Please execute and send back to me via facsimile courier at your earliest convenience Also please be sure to send back all ancillary documentation that is required See my note to you on Regards Tom Alterson JP Morgan Futures Inc Wall Street st Floor New York NY Tel Fax Thomas P Alterson PM To cc Michael C PMORGAN Charles A PMORGAN Subject JPMFI Futures Account Opening Documentation Enron North America Corporation Sara Please find attached below the documentation required for the opening of a futures account with JP Morgan Futures Inc Included are Futures Client Agreement Risk Disclosures Letter in Lieu W Tax Form See attached file ENRON NA CORP Client AgreementdocSee attached file Risk Disclosure Statement docSee attached file Letter in LieudocSee attached file fwpdf In order to a open futures account with JP Morgan Futures Inc JPMFI you must sign the attached Client Agreement and as regulations require check each appropriate Risk Disclosure acknowledgment box as well your preference of notification or immediate liquidation Further please complete and sign the W form included above You must also provide authorization for Enron North America Corporation to open a futures account with JPMFI by either completing the attached Letter in Lieu on your letterhead or by providing us with your own form of authorization Please note if you use your form of authorization it should include the names of the individuals authorized to sign the Client Agreement as well as those authorized to place orders for the account Additionally if there is an advisor relationship whereby an advisor is placing orders on behalf of Enron North America Corporation please also provide this representation Please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns Regards Tom Alterson JP Morgan Futures Inc Wall Street st Floor New York NY Tel Fax Enron Corp JPMorganFuturesBlklneddoc Enron Corp JPMorganFuturesCLEANdoc ENRON NA CORP Client Agreementdoc Risk Disclosure Statement doc Letter in Lieudoc fwpdf

Futures AgreementI have tried to fax you the cover and signature page from our Client Agreement times now and the fax is not going through I am sending to fax Please advise if there is another number I cna fax this too In addition I have been instructed by our compliance people to send you back the original copies of the Client Agreement so that a duly authorized representative of Enron can sign off on Section b The Agreement has been sent to you Please have the correct boxes checked initialed and then sent back to us for execution by JPMFI We will turn them around in one day Attached below is a copy of the cover and sig page fax copy in pdf format See attached file Enron covsigpdf If you have any questions please call me at Thank you Tom Alterson Enron covsigpdf

Re Futures Agreementhave a call into the compliance officer who supposedly sent the docs At the request of Michael Schneider I have attached a zip file containing the documentation we require in order for Enron NA Corp to open listed options accounts with JP Morgan Securities Inc Please review the instructions complete the necessary docs and feel free to contact me with any questions Exchange Traded Options Account Agreement and related documentation is attached below In addition to signing the Agreement you should make sure to read all disclosure statements as well as sign and date the Options New Account Form Also you should note that in order to have the authority to transfer funds between or among any accounts which may exist in other areas of JP Morgan you must actively acknowledge the Authorization to Transfer Funds form attached Further just as with the JPMFI account were going to need you to completely fill out the JPMSI Letter In Lieu attached See attached file Enron NA Corp OCC DocumentsZIP Again if you have any questions please phone me Regards Tom Alterson on AM To cc Subject Re Futures Agreement Tom Thanks for the info I did not receive anything from you yesterday Wed April Please update Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Thomas P Alterson alterson pm To organcom cc Subject Futures Agreement AM Sara I have tried to fax you the cover and signature page from our Client Agreement times now and the fax is not going through I am sending to fax Please advise if there is another number I cna fax this too In addition I have been instructed by our compliance people to send you back the original copies of the Client Agreement so that a duly authorized representative of Enron can sign off on Section b The Agreement has been sent to you Please have the correct boxes checked initialed and then sent back to us for execution by JPMFI We will turn them around in one day Attached below is a copy of the cover and sig page fax copy in pdf format See attached file Enron covsigpdf If you have any questions please call me at Thank you Tom Alterson See attached file Enron covsigpdf Enron covsigpdf Enron NA Corp OCC DocumentsZIP

List of authorized tradersWould you please send me a list of authorized traders for Enron NA Corp We are updating our files and noticed that we are missing an ATL for Enron ATL form See attached file ATL Enron NA Corpdoc Thank you Tom Alterson ATL Enron NA Corpdoc

FW List of authorized tradersyou been able to take a look at this I hate to be a pest but we are in the midst of an internal audit right now and we are being pressured for this list Thank you for your time Tom Alterson Thomas P Alterson PM To cc Subject List of authorized traders Document link not converted Sara Would you please send me a list of authorized traders for Enron NA Corp We are updating our files and noticed that we are missing an ATL for Enron ATL form See attached file ATL Enron NA Corpdoc Thank you Tom Alterson ATL Enron NA Corpdoc

Re Enron North America Corp executuion of Futures Agreement Cc Please direct comments my way Thank you Tom Alterson JP Morgan Futures Inc Wall Street st Floor New York NY Tel Fax on PM To cc Subject Enron North America Corp executuion of Futures Agreement Tom To whose attention should I direct comments to the Client Agreement Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax This communication is for informational purposes only It is not intended as an offer or solicitation for the purchase or sale of any financial instrument or as an official confirmation of any transaction All market prices data and other information are not warranted as to completeness or accuracy and are subject to change without notice Any comments or statements made herein do not necessarily reflect those of JP Morgan Chase Co Incorporated its subsidiaries and affiliates

Re Futures AgreementCorinne Samon shall be reviewing the blacklined copy of the agreement youve attached She will be available later this afternoon to discuss suggested changes to our agreement as well as any additional comments you may have Corinne can be reached at or via email at Regards Tom Alterson on AM To cc Subject Futures Agreement Thomas Attached is a redline of the Client Agreement I know that Gary Hickerson will be meeting with J P Morgan early next week and would like to have this agreed Please advise as to what attorney will review my comments and put me in touch with that person today Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks See attached file JPMorganFuturesRdocdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax JPMorganFuturesRdocdoc
